parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns a polyline marker's path data.

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[markerPolyline]] marker

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> marker: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] - <tt>[x1, y1, x2, y2, ... xn, yn]</tt>

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[markerPolyline]] "_USER_DEFINED #0/0/1"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Returns your first polyline's data in Singleplayer</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMarkerPolyline]] [[setMarkerPolylineLocal]]
</value></part></template></root>
